docs.abstract: Rory Smith On Soccer column examines how Premier League's insatiable appetite for talent is resulting in smaller European clubs receiving unexpected and unusual windfalls; points to sale by second division French team Le Havre A C of forward Lys Mousset to Bournemouth as example, noting that Le Havre received about $7 million in deal.

headline.main: Premier League’s Wealth Often Subsidizes Clubs Across the Channel
